GaussianMixtures.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    GaussianMixtures.API
    GaussianMixtures.CSstats — Type.

    CSstats a type holding centered and scaled zeroth and first order GMM statistics

    GaussianMixtures.CovType
    GaussianMixtures.Cstats — Type.

    Cstats, a type holding centered zeroth, first and second order GMM statistics

    GaussianMixtures.Data — Type.

    Data is a type for holding an array of feature vectors (i.e., matrices), or references to files on disk. The data is automatically loaded when needed, e.g., by indexing.

    GaussianMixtures.DataOrMatrix
    GaussianMixtures.DiagCov
    GaussianMixtures.FullCov
    GaussianMixtures.GMM — Type.

    GMM is the type that stores information of a Guassian Mixture Model. Currently two main covariance types are supported: full covarariance and diagonal covariance.

    GaussianMixtures.GMM2
    GaussianMixtures.GMMk
    GaussianMixtures.GMMprior — Type.

    GMMprior is a type that holds the prior for training GMMs using Variational Bayes.

    GaussianMixtures.GaussianMixture — Type.

    GaussianMixture, an abstract type for a mixture of full-covariance or diagonal-covariance Gaussian distributions

    GaussianMixtures.GaussianMixtures
    GaussianMixtures.History — Type.

    History, a type to record the history of how a GMM is built.

    GaussianMixtures.MatOrVecMat
    GaussianMixtures.UTriangular
    GaussianMixtures.VGMM — Type.

    VGMM is the type that is used to store a GMM in the Variational Bayes training.

    GaussianMixtures.VecOrMat
    GaussianMixtures._load
    GaussianMixtures._size
    GaussianMixtures.addhist! — Function.

    addhist!(::GMM, s) adds a comment s to the GMMM

    GaussianMixtures.avll
    GaussianMixtures.binsearch
    GaussianMixtures.cholinv
    GaussianMixtures.compute_range
    GaussianMixtures.covar — Function.

    covar(GMM.Σ) extracts the covariances Σ (which may be encoded as chol(inv(Σ))

    GaussianMixtures.covars — Function.

    covars(::GMM) returns the covariance matrices Σ of the Gaussians in the mixture.

    GaussianMixtures.csstats
    GaussianMixtures.cstats
    GaussianMixtures.density — Function.

    density(gmm::GMM, X) returns log(P(X|μ, Σ)) 

    GaussianMixtures.dmap

    GaussianMixtures.em!
    GaussianMixtures.emstep!
    GaussianMixtures.eval
    GaussianMixtures.expectations
    GaussianMixtures.eye
    GaussianMixtures.forcesymmetric
    GaussianMixtures.full — Function.

    full(::GMM) turns a diagonal covariance GMM into a full-covariance GMMM

    GaussianMixtures.gmmposterior
    GaussianMixtures.gmmsplit
    GaussianMixtures.history
    GaussianMixtures.include
    GaussianMixtures.kind — Function.

    kind(::GMM) returns the kind of GMM, either :diag or :full

    GaussianMixtures.logsumexp
    GaussianMixtures.logsumexpw
    GaussianMixtures.logρ
    GaussianMixtures.lowerbound
    GaussianMixtures.maxapost
    GaussianMixtures.means — Function.

    means(::GMM) returns the means μ of the Gaussians in the mixture

    GaussianMixtures.mstep
    GaussianMixtures.mylogdet
    GaussianMixtures.n_components
    GaussianMixtures.nparams — Function.

    nparams(::GMM) returns the number of free parameters in the GMM

    GaussianMixtures.trAB
    GaussianMixtures.vec
    GaussianMixtures.weights — Function.

    weights(::GMM) returns the weights w, or priors, of the Gaussians in the mixture
